MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH32 postcode area of Longniddry, affecting a number of properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.33am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed this has been caused by 3rd party damage to our high voltage underground cable network near Southfield Farm. Due to the complex repairs required our team are now working to get your power back on via generator as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.30pm on the 5th of March 2021.
